title: What are the basic of elements of thought? - Quora

response.answer_text: The basic element of any thought is the data we gather through our senses. And the collection of this data, is default. It will be automatically collected. But this data is useless unless you attach a value to it. For example : if you go out, and you saw a girl. The sense used here is your eyes. Data is “a girl”. And using our intellect, we attach a value to this data. That value can be, “this girl is beautiful or ugly whatever.” “Beautiful/ugly” is the value to the data, you collected through your eyes. And this,kick starts the thought process of your mind.
awareness of, then identity as; then, naming of, and absorbing in, the awareness and perception and knowledge and consciousness.
